import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import BookCard from"../components/BookCard";import"../Styles/PaginaPrincipal.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function PaginaPrincipal(){const[libros,setLibros]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{fetch("https://localhost:5072/api/Libros")// Ajustá el puerto según tu backend
